channel.title: Make a cache updater to your 317!
channel.description: Hello everyone. I want to create a cache updater for my server. You know what I mean the Searching updates on startup thing. I want to have an updater in my client so whenever I have a new model it downloads the new cache automatically. Does anyone know how to do that? I have seen lots of servers who do it. But i never found a tutorial on it. I hope someone can help me thanks in advance, Artegoworld owner :D Ps what I actually mean is how to use the updater.java thing?

item.title: Make a cache updater to your 317!
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

Hello everyone.
I want to create a cache updater for my server.
You know what I mean the Searching updates on startup thing.
I want to have an updater in my client so whenever I have a new model it downloads the new cache automatically.
Does anyone know how to do that?
I have seen lots of servers who do it. But i never found a tutorial on it.
I hope someone can help me thanks in advance, Artegoworld owner
Ps what I actually mean is how to use the updater.java thing?

Read full topic
item.source: Make a cache updater to your 317!
